top10_tweets_like:
Since this has been coming up a lot, I've updated my "Regression in R" lecture: https://t.co/QZrGzCR4P6 

It's got everything from OLS to high-dimensional FEs to clustered SEs to regression tables to.. etc. Basically, all the tools I use in my own workflow. 

#econtwitter #rstats https://t.co/2JrSGyybIz

I have updated the *Data Science Course in a Box* resources at https://t.co/N21dyees9Y. If you're teaching introductory data science with #rstats, take a look and feel free to use/adapt as you like. Source code for all materials are linked from the website and licensed CC BY-SA! https://t.co/uw9HrzffkD

"Learning Statistics with R", course notes for teaching R to Psychology students by @djnavarro https://t.co/j1n8mgAw36 #rstats

{plumber} allows you to create a web API by merely decorating your existing #RStats source code with special comments

The plumber team is keen for your help releasing v1.0.0 
Check out below for where you can play with the release candidate, read the notes, & how you can help. https://t.co/WZvOWhwOeq
TIL from talking with @charliejhadley: If you click the little R button in the Files pane, it takes you back to the root directory of your project. #rstats https://t.co/ocoSzXzL2b
